ModMetadata.Name: Cardboard Box Tooltips
ModMetadata.Author: lorexcold
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Cardboard Box Tooltips[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a Stationeers Launchpad Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the Stationeers Launchpad plugin. Installation Guide: [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad?tab=readme-ov-file#fresh[/url]
Cardboard Box Tooltips adds hover tooltips to cardboard boxes, displaying their contents directly in the extended item text for easy inventory management without opening the box.
[h2]Features[/h2] [list] []Extended Tooltips: Hover over a cardboard box to see a list of its contents, including item names and quantities for stackable items. []Color Coded Display: Item names and quantities are now colorized for better readability. []Empty Box Handling: Clearly indicates if the box is empty or has no storage slots. []Ignore List: Default Stationeers package prefabs (e.g., PortablesPackage, ResidentialPackage, etc.) are excluded since they already show contents. []Limit Protection: Displays up to 20 items (in case a mod increases box slots). [/list]
[h2]Notes[/h2> [list] []Tooltips only appear for cardboard boxes and integrate seamlessly with the existing item inspection UI. []Compatible with mods that expand box storage slots. [*]Dedicated Server Compatible. [/list]
[h2]Requirements[/h2] [list] [*]StationeersLaunchPad with BepInEx installed. [/list]
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 1.0.3:[/h3] [list] [*]Added missing default food package to ignore list "ItemWaterBottleBag" [*]Fixed missing method exception [/list]
